properties.entry:
All of the CQ component and template definitions for the 'UM Core' project.
During development, the files in this module should be sync'd to your CQ instance using the FileVault command line tool available with CQ. There is also a plugin for Eclipse called "vaultclipse" that can be used instead of the command line tool.
It is recommended that this module not contain any Java code and instead Java code should be placed in either the core-taglib module or the core-services module as appropriate.
